name: The Climbers
description:
Climber is quite simple but exciting game. Playing it with your friends or by yourself, you can spend your time with pleasure. Save climber's life and get as high as you can. But don't forget to beware the obstacles on your way. Feel the competition spirit and share your scores with friends. How far will you get?

Press Space and Enter to control climbers.

Tip: Play with your friends for more fun!

This game was made for the Ludumdare Please follow the link and vote us This game was made for the Ludumdare Please follow the link and vote us
